name: Endless Jumping Rin
description:
My first game made in Construct 2!

Controls can be found on the game menu (the question mark button).

Goal of the game:

Jump on platforms and catch falling stars to earn points!
Earn as many points as you can.

Sounds generated with: https://sfxr.me/

Comment your highest score!

(If 10 people score over 1,300 points, I'll add a section in the game that congratulates you. The Hall Of Fame, if you will)
